story: Mohammad Tayseer shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Google Calendar - Get the new Android app
caption: google.com
description: The new Google Calendar app is designed to save you time and help you make the most of every day. Schedule View brings your schedule to life and makes it easy to see what's ahead with images and maps, Events from Gmail are added to your Calendar and Assists help you fill in your calendar, quickly anâ€¦

data.message: I hate the new material design ... I better start looking for a different job. It's a matter of weeks till everyone is gonna explicitly ask for it
@Ahmad Alfy: I felt it's an attempt to take the next step after Flat UI (or Metro as MS used to call it), or did you also hate Metro?

Hassan Aly Selim to clarify, I don't hate how it look ... to the contrary I think it is awesome. I hate the fact that people are gonna ask for it in the future. Binding animations to scrolling is something I hate. It's hard to do, hard to optimize, hard to make it perform well ...
